_header: Saint Mary Egyptian in Egypt was I-bore
Subjects: saints’ lives; Mary of Egypt, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Mary of Egypt in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEynte Marie egipciake in egipte was iboreAll hire ȝonge lif
                    heo ladde In sunne & in hore…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…þus seynt marie Egipciake out of hire fol dedeTurnde to
                    heuene blisse þoru penaunce þat heo gan lede

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint marye egipciake In egipte was I borealle here ȝonge lyf
                    ȝhe ladde in synne & ek In hore…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…so to don aboue þis erþe ar we hennes wendeto come
                    to þe ioye þat ȝhe is in after oure dayus ende
Bod779.Attributed Title: S Marie gipcien þe holy woman (f. 139v)

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Marie Egipcian in Egipte was i boreAl hire ȝonge lyf heo
                    liuede in sunne and in hore…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þere heo is mid Ihesu crist in Ioye wiþ outen
                    endeNow God for þe loue of seinte Marie þider us lete wende.
                    A.M.E.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodEngPoete94.First Lines:
…Frere goȝdne hwo gan þe hider to schuch
                    awrethedmatereHow is þe stat of holicherche iloked &
                    cristindom…
BodEngPoete94.Last Lines:
…[Þ]us seint Mariie egiptiak out of here fo[ul]
                    dedeTurned to heuene riche blesse þutȝ penance þat ȝeo
                    gan lede
BodEngPoete94.Note:
Fragments; ff. 3-4 formerly Oxford,  Bodleian Library 80.G.40.Med [now with Eng. poet. e.94] (printed book),
                    lines 182-87, 213-19; f. 1 single leaf, lines 293-320, 325-46.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEinte Marie egyptiane In egypte was i boreAl hire ȝounge liif
                    heo liuede in sunne and in hore…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Þus seinte Marie egyptiane out of hire fole dedeWende to
                    heouene blisse þoruȝ penaunce þat heo gan lede
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 260-71.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint marie egipciake in egipt was y boreAl here ȝonge lif she
                    ladde in synne & in hore…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Þus marie egiptiake out of hire fool dedeturned to
                    heuene blisse þorw penaunce þat she gan lede
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEinte marie egipcian in egipt was I boreAll hir ȝonge liif
                    sche ladde in synne as an hore…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Þus marie egipcian out of hire foule dedeTurned to
                    heuenli blis þour penaunce þat sche gan lede

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Seinte Marie Egipciake in Egipt was y boreAl here ȝonge lyf hy
                    ladde in synne & in hore…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…þus Seinte Marie Egipciake out of here fol dedeTurnde to
                    heuene riche blisse þorgh penaunce þat hy gan lede

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Seinte Marie gipciake in egipte was iboreAl hur ȝonge lif he
                    ladde in sunne and in hore…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Þus seinte marie egipciake out of hur fol dedeTurnde to
                    heueriche blisse þoru penance þat he gan lede

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Marie Egypcyake in Egipte was yboreAl hare ȝonge lyf
                    ȝeo ladde in sunne & in hore…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Þus Seint Marie Egypciake out of hure ffol dedeTurnde to
                    heuene riche blisse þorw penaunce þat ȝeo gan lede

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint marie egypcian in egipte was y borealle hure ȝonge lyf
                    heo ladde in synne & in hore…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…þus seint marie Egiptian come out of hure foul dede&
                    turnde to heuene blis þorȝe penauns þat heo gan lede

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEinte Marie egipcyake in egipte was y boreal hure ȝonge lyf
                    ȝo ladde in synne & in hore…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
… Þus seint Marie egipciake out of hure foule dedeturnde
                    to eueriche blisse þoru penance þat ȝo gan lede
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancta Maria egipciaca (f. 62v, by scribe in margin
                    beside first line); Maria egipciak (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint marie egipciake in egipt was iboreal hire ȝong lif heo ladde in sinne & in hore…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …þus seint marie egipciake out of here foul dedetorneþe to heuen blisse þorou penaunce þat heo gan lede
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xxx” added to left margin by later hand (f. 55v).

Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Marie egiptiak in egipt was iboreAl hire ȝonge lif heo ladde in sunne and in hore…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Þus seint marie egiptiak turnde hire out of fol dedeAnd wende into heuene riche þorw penaunce þat heo gan lede

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEynt marie egipciake in egipte was yboreAlle hire ȝonge lif ȝe ladde in sunne & in hore…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou god vor þe loue of Seint marie egipciane þat such penance þolid hereBringe ous to þe ioye of heuene & of helle be skere

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEinte marie egipciake In egipte was IboreAt hure ȝonge lif heo ladde In sunne and In hore…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …þus seinte marie gipciake out of hure fol dedeTurnde to euerich blisse þoru penance þat heo gan lede
BLEge2891.Attributed Title: De sancta maria egipciake (rubric in margin, f. 62v)

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEinte Marie Egipciake in Egipte was iboreAl hire ȝunge lif heo ladde in sinne & in hore…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Þus Seinte Marie Egipciake out of hire foldedeTurnde to heueneriche blis for penance þat heo gan lede

BLRoy17Cxvii.First Lines:
SAynt mary gypcyake in egypt was borneAlle hyre ȝong lyf scho
                    lede in hordome…
BLRoy17Cxvii.Last Lines:
…Vy[?] […]then calle heuenO[…]vs ywyþer
                    […] for hys names seuen Amen Amen Amen
BLRoy17Cxvii.Note:
Affected by damp. Text partially recoverd though use of cold light
                    source.

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Marie Egipcian Egipt she was born InAl hir ȝonge lyf she
                    lad in leccherie & synne…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu Crist of heuen vs alle wisse & redeAnd fro
                    þe pyne of helle he ȝeue vs grace to shede Amen
